workshoptitle: Automate your deployment with OCI DevOps, Save The Wildlife

tutorials.title: Get Started
tutorials.description: Prerequisites for LiveLabs (Oracle-owned tenancies). The title of the lab and the Contents Menu title (the title above) match for Prerequisite lab. This lab is always first.

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Build Pipeline
tutorials.description: Run the OCI DevOps Build Pipeline

tutorials.title: Lab 5: Deployment Pipeline
tutorials.description: Run the OCI DevOps Deployment Pipeline

tutorials.title: Lab 6: New Feature and Rollback
tutorials.description: Develop and deploy a new feature, rollback the latest change

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
